Name: Sly Slime
About the game: You are helping little slime that accidentally fell into a pit trying to eat a mushroom. Navigate him through all levels while overcoming obstacles and solving puzzles that are too hard for him. Features: • More than 60 handcrafted levels • Low poly visual style • Meditative Acoustic Guitar Tracks
